name: Uber Hax0r Simulator
description:
The game focuses around recreating TV and movie styled hacking action scenes. These scenes never make any sense and mostly have nonsensical code. The Uber Hax0r Sim emulates Cyberpunk/80s hacking pop culture.  

Much thanks to the following: 

Astrophysics for the awesome music, 

Fouriersoft for the basis of the terminal code, 

and Robb Owen for his VSCode palette titled "SynthWave '84" that inspired the look of this terminal.
